entry.desc: This variable controls MOM6 memory mode. In non-symmetric mode (default), all arrays are given the same shape. In symmetric mode, declarations are dependent on the variables staggered location on the Arakawa C grid. This allows loops to be symmetric and stencils to be applied more uniformly.
This variable controls the MOM6 infrastructure API.

This variable is used to choose from a set of predefined ocean diagnostics configurations. Each configuration corresponds to a different combination of frequency, precision, and field lists. Configuration ordered in increasing scope/frequency: "spinup", "production", "development". Further customization of diagnostics may be done by copying an edited version of diag_table file in SourceMods/src.mom/
Flag to turn on/off the MOM6 sections diagnostics.
